title: Grid-connected wind-light combined power generation system and power generation method thereof

events.title: Application filed by Sany Electric Co Ltd

classifications.description: The renewable source being solar energy of photovoltaic origin
The renewable source being wind energy

Systems for supplying or distributing electric power characterised by decentralized, dispersed, or local generation wherein a plurality of decentralised, dispersed or local energy generation technologies are operated simultaneously
Power conversion systems, e.g. maximum power point trackers
Power conversion electric or electronic aspects

abstract: The invention discloses a grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system, comprising a wind power generating set connected to a power grid, a solar photovoltaic square array, a detection device (11), a power storage device (12), and a master control device (13); When the sum of the output power generated by the wind power generating set and the solar photovoltaic array is greater than the output power fluctuation range required by the grid, the master control device (13) controls the power storage device (12) to store electric energy; when the sum of the output power is less than the grid requirement When the output power fluctuates within a certain range, the master control device (13) controls the power storage device (12) to release electric energy. During the working process of the grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system, the power generation and storage device (12) of the supplementary generating set can adjust the power transmitted by the power generation system to the grid in real time according to the output power, so that the power output from the power generation system to the grid It is relatively stable, thereby improving the power supply stability of the power generation system and ensuring the power supply quality of the power grid.
abstract_original: 本发明公开了一种并网型风光联合发电系统，包括分别连入电网的风力发电机组、太阳能光伏方阵，以及检测装置(11)、蓄电装置(12)、总控装置(13)；当风力发电机组和太阳能光伏方阵产生的输出功率，之和大于电网要求的输出功率波动范围时，总控装置(13)控制蓄电装置(12)储存电能；当输出功率之和小于电网要求的输出功率波动范围时，总控装置(13)控制蓄电装置(12)释放电能。在并网型风光联合发电系统的工作过程中，补充发电机组发电和储电装置(12)能够根据输出功率的大小，实时地调整发电系统传输给电网的功率，使得发电系统输出至电网的功率较为稳定，从而提高了发电系统的供电稳定性，保证了电网的供电质量。
claims: 2.根据权利要求1所述的并网型风光联合发电系统，其特征在于，还包括风机控制器(14)；所述风机控制器(14)在所述总控装置(13)的控制下，通过控制所述风力发电机组输出电能的传输方向，控制所述蓄电装置(12)可选择地储存电能。2. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system according to claim 1, further comprising a wind turbine controller (14); the wind turbine controller (14) is under the control of the master control device (13) The electric storage device (12) is controlled to selectively store electric energy by controlling the transmission direction of the electric energy output by the wind power generating set.

3.根据权利要求1所述的并网型风光联合发电系统，其特征在于，还包括光伏阵列控制器(15)；所述光伏阵列控制器(15)在所述总控装置(13)的控制下，通过控制所述太阳能光伏方阵输出电能的传输方向，控制所述蓄电装置(12)可选择地储存电能。3. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system according to claim 1, further comprising a photovoltaic array controller (15); Under control, by controlling the transmission direction of the output electric energy of the solar photovoltaic array, the electric storage device (12) is controlled to selectively store electric energy.

4.根据权利要求1至3任一项所述的并网型风光联合发电系统，其特征在于，所述蓄电装置(12)为电化学储能装置。4. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system according to any one of claims 1 to 3, characterized in that the power storage device (12) is an electrochemical energy storage device.

5.根据权利要求1至3任一项所述的并网型风光联合发电系统，其特征在于，还包括补充发电装置(16)，当所述风力发电机组与所述太阳能光伏方阵产生的输出功率之和小于预定功率的波动范围的最小值时，所述总控装置(13)控制所述补充发电装置(16)发电。5. The grid-connected wind-wind combined power generation system according to any one of claims 1 to 3, characterized in that it also includes a supplementary power generation device (16), when the wind power generating set and the solar photovoltaic array generate When the sum of the output power is less than the minimum value of the predetermined power fluctuation range, the general control device (13) controls the supplementary power generation device (16) to generate electricity.

6.根据权利要求5所述的并网型风光联合发电系统，其特征在于，所述补充发电装置(16)为燃油发电机组。6. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation system according to claim 5, characterized in that the supplementary power generation device (16) is a fuel-fired generator set.

8.根据权利要求7所述的并网型风光联合发电方法，其特征在于，在上述步骤13)和步骤14)中，通过控制所述风力发电机组电能的传输方向，控制所述蓄电装置可选择地储存电能。8. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation method according to claim 7, characterized in that, in the above step 13) and step 14), the power storage device is controlled by controlling the transmission direction of the electric energy of the wind power generating set Optionally store electrical energy.

9.根据权利要求7所述的并网型风光联合发电方法，其特征在于，在上述步骤13)和步骤14)中，通过控制所述太阳能光伏方阵电能的传输方向，控制所述蓄电装置可选择地储存电能。9. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation method according to claim 7, characterized in that, in the above step 13) and step 14), by controlling the transmission direction of the solar photovoltaic square array electric energy, the power storage The device optionally stores electrical energy.

10.根据权利要求7至9任一项所述的并网型风光联合发电方法，其特征在于，在步骤14)中，还可以包括以下步骤：10. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation method according to any one of claims 7 to 9, characterized in that, in step 14), the following steps may also be included:
      
      
         141)控制补充发电装置发电。141) Control the supplementary power generation device to generate electricity.

11.根据权利要求10所述的并网型风光联合发电方法，其特征在于，所述补充发电装置可为重油发电机组。11. The grid-connected wind-solar combined power generation method according to claim 10, characterized in that the supplementary power generation device can be a heavy oil generator set.
